6571.quoteText:
Access

By accessing the Website, you certify that:

  • you are at least 18 years of age or the age of majority under the laws of your state, province or country. and
  • you know and understand that the materials presented at and/or downloadable from the Website include explicit visual, audio, and/or textual depictions of nudity and explicit sexual activities.
6571.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

9075.quoteText: You agree that the Terms of Service, your use of the Website, as well as any claim relating to, arising out of, or in connection with the Terms of Service and your use of the Website, shall be governed by the laws of the Czech Republic without regard to conflict of law provisions.
9075.title: Users agree to comply with the law of the service's country

tosdr.case: Users agree to comply with the law of the service's country

9077.quoteText:
and
  • your Submission is compliant with all laws, including, but not limited to, 18 U.S.C. § 2257 and 28 C.F.R 75. and
  • you retain all of your ownership rights in your Submissions.
9077.title: You maintain ownership of your data

tosdr.case: You maintain ownership of your data

9079.quoteText: If we make changes to this Privacy Policy, we will post the revised Privacy Policy on the Website and update the “Last Updated” date at the top of this Privacy Policy.
9079.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

9080.quoteText:
Please note that if you request the erasure of your personal information:

  • We may retain some of your personal information as necessary for our legitimate business interests, such as fraud detection and prevention and enhancing safety. For example, if we suspend an account for fraud or safety reasons, we may retain certain information from that account to prevent that user from opening a new account in the future.
9080.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

tosdr.case: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

10799.quoteText: We use cookies and other similar technologies, such as web beacons, pixels, and mobile identifiers.
10799.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

10800.quoteText:
1.3 Information We Collect from Third Parties.

We may collect information, including personal information that others provide about you when they use the Website, or obtain information from other sources and combine that with information we collect through the Website.

10802.quoteText: If any provision of these terms of service is deemed invalid by a court of competent jurisdiction, the invalidity of such provision shall not affect the validity of the remaining provisions of these terms of service, which shall remain in full force and effect.

10803.quoteText: No waiver of any term of these terms of service shall be deemed a further or continuing waiver of such term or any other term, and Xvideos’ failure to assert any right or provision under these terms of service shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision.

10805.quoteText:
Lodging Complaints.

You have the right to file a complaint about the data processing activities carried out before the competent data protection authorities, e.g. to The Office for Personal Data Protection. Also all users may contact: dpo@xvideos.com.

10808.quoteText: Xvideos does not permit copyright infringing activities or infringement of intellectual property rights on its Website, and will promptly remove content if properly notified of infringements on third parties' intellectual property rights.
